about_the_game:
Ferocious violets wake from their centuries-long slumber, wreaking havoc on the lands. Can a lowly courier stop them?

Stricken with abilities after being attacked by Violets, Asteric is tasked by the king to wield his new powers to rid the lands of Violets and roaming monsters.

In this demo, explore a full vertical slice of the lands of Velare, including:

  • Battle monsters in forts to be rewarded with Skull Pendants that can be traded with the Dojo Master to learn new skills and moves.

  • Unearth secrets within one fully fleshed-out dungeon, as well as eradicating the enemies that stand in your way.

  • Collect new items to guide Asteric on his journey as well as upgrading weapons by merging older ones.

  • With Asteric’s mysterious new powers, he’s the only one capable of defeating the Violets with their ability to merge with each other to become bigger and stronger.

  • Trade weapon scraps of degraded weapons to increase inventory capacity.

  • Help characters with side quests to be rewarded with valuable treasure that can be used to barter and trade in a world with no currency.

  • Travel across towns, farms and forests for unique side quests, meet Velare’s citizens and even ride horses!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 or greater
  • Processor: Modern Quad core or greater (e.g. Core i5 4570, Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM (OpenGL 4)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 16:9 recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey (macOS 12) or greater
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 16:9 recommended

short_description: Attack, dodge, and counter the monsters invading the land of Velare in The Violets of Amicus™, a 2D action-adventure inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and modern combat games alike. The ferocious Violets are waking from their ancient gardens. Can a lowly courier save the kingdom?
